dict.string:
TMPFILE=`mktemp /tmp/tm-svn.XXXXXX` || exit 1
# this should really be tabular HTML output, but it would take more time to produce a decent formatter than I have available at the moment. # Feel free to implement and submit a fancier implementation!
"${TM_SVN:=svn}" annotate "$TM_FILEPATH" &> "$TMPFILE"
open -a TextMate "$TMPFILE" &
#rm "$TMPFILE" # ideally, we'd do this, but it creates a race condition, because 'open' is asynchronous.
